alert.note: Alert for Northwest Blue Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 29 at 8:40PM PST until December 03 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 10 to 20 inches possible with locally higher accumulation near the crest-line. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Oregon, Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. In Washington, Northwest Blue Mountains. * WHEN...From Friday morning through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
